action_bar_actions._description: The label for the actions dropdown on the action button bar

alert_close._description: Screen reader text for the close button on alerts

autonumeric_abbr_billions._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the billions (e.g. $1.2b)

autonumeric_abbr_millions._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the millions (e.g. $1.2m)

autonumeric_abbr_thousands._description: The suffix to show after an abbreviated value in the thousands (e.g. $1.2k)

checklist_select_all._description: Text for the link in a checklist to select all items.

checklist_clear_all._description: Text for the link in a checklist to clear selections.

checklist_no_items._description: Text in a checklist when no items are shown based on the current filter.

grid_back_to_top._description: Text for link in grid to scroll back to the top.

grid_column_picker_all_categories._description: Button text for category filters used to indicate that all columns should be shown in the column picker

grid_column_picker_description_header._description: In the column picker, the header for the column showing the description of the columns to include in the grid.

grid_column_picker_header._description: Header text for the grid column picker screen
grid_column_picker_header.message: Scegliere le colonne da mostrare nell’elenco

grid_column_picker_name_header._description: In the column picker, the header for the column showing the names of the columns to include in the grid.

grid_column_picker_search_placeholder._description: Search text placeholder for the search box on the grid column picker

grid_column_picker_submit._description: Button text for applying changes made in the grid column picker

grid_columns_button._description: Label for button to select columns to display in a grid.

grid_filters_apply._description: Text for button on filters flyout to apply the selected filters to the grid

grid_filters_button._description: Label for button to select filters to be applied to a grid.

grid_filters_clear._description: Text for button on filters flyout to clear the selected filters for the grid

grid_filters_header._description: Header text for grid filters flyout

grid_filters_hide._description: Hide link text for grid filters flyout

grid_filters_summary_header._description: Header text for filter summary on top of grid

grid_load_more._description: The text for the button to load additional rows into the grid if more rows are available.

grid_search_placeholder._description: Placeholder text in grid search box

grid_column_picker_search_no_columns._description: Displays when no columns are found for the specified search text.

modal_footer_cancel_button._description: Default lable text for modal cancel button

modal_footer_primary_button._description: Default lable text for modal primary button

page_noaccess_button.message: Torna a una pagina non classificata

page_noaccess_description.message:
Spiacenti, non si possiedono i diritti per questa pagina.
Se si pensa di possedere i diritti, contattare l’amministratore del sistema.

page_noaccess_header.message: Procedere, qui non c’è nulla da vedere

text_expand_close_text._description: Text for the close button on the text expand modal

grid_action_bar_clear_selection._description: Clear the selections in the grid.

grid_action_bar_cancel_mobile_actions._description: Close the menu where you choose an action in mobile multiselect.

grid_action_bar_choose_action._description: Open a menu to choose an action in mobile  multiselect.

date_field_invalid_date_message._description: error message shown when an invalid date is entered.

date_range_picker_min_date_error._description: error message for date range picker
date_range_picker_min_date_error.message: La data finale deve essere posteriore alla data iniziale

date_range_picker_max_date_error._description: error message for date range picker
date_range_picker_max_date_error.message: La data iniziale deve essere anteriore alla data finale

file_upload_invalid_file.message: Questo tipo di file non è valido

file_upload_paste_link.message: Incolla un link a un file

searchfield_searching._description: text for ui-select search control while performing a remote search

searchfield_no_records._description: text for ui-select search control when no records are found.
searchfield_no_records.message: Non è stato trovato nessun record corrispondente

wizard_navigator_finish._description: Text displayed on the next button when a wizard is ready for completion.

wizard_navigator_next._description: Text displayed on a wizard's next button.

wizard_navigator_previous._description: Text displayed on a wizard's previous button.

datepicker_today._description: Text displayed in the Today button of the datepicker

datepicker_clear._description: Text displayed in the Clear button of the datepicker

datepicker_close._description: Text displayed in the Close button of the datepicker
